welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Loganville, where small town charm meets big city opportunities! Get ready to explore our beautiful parks, delicious restaurants, and friendly community. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our charming city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Winder Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Winder Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gwinnett County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Madison Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Madison Municipal Airport handles all freight and package shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
